title: Why I voted for Deep Space Illaoi...
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pumxf6LBn2E
https://i.imgur.com/IPCn23J.png

LOOKS LIKE DREADNOVA GANGPLANK'S GOT A STRANGE TASTE IN WOMEN.

replies.body:
Are you saying you wouldn't date a thicc, alien-infested space explorer who summons tentacles? 

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

I do love me my Big Buff Polynesian Tentababe
{{sticker:sg-lux}}

>LOOKS LIKE DREADNOVA GANGPLANK'S GOT A STRANGE TASTE IN WOMEN.

https://i.imgur.com/VwX62Kw.png?noredirect

You don't say.

I mean, it's not exactly the same based on the concept

Also you are aware GP and Illaoi were a thing right?
Hence my comment on Dreadnova's taste in women...yes
They could always change the color of the tentacles to the ones in the recall.
Space Hentai >>>>>>> Vines >>>>>> Sharp Robot arms.

my exact reason for voting it as well

i can see the lore implications already

illaoi was a member of GP's space crew but got infected with something 

also for people saying it looks nothing like the art

the artwork is just concept its not final at all

The tentacles look so greasy, I bet there would be a splatter of black matter everywhere when she ults.
yummy
First thing I thought of when I saw the voting options. I would pay for Dreadnova especially if it got some voice lines towards gp
Well they did date in the past
